income_messages:
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-15 20:01:53
SUBJECT: Hello
Hello
I am Maj.Jack Harry an American Army currently on a peace mission in
Syria. I wish to let you know about a business of supplying
Pharmaceutical active ingredients from India to an American company,
this is a very lucrative business.If you have the ability to handle
this business, I will introduce you to the US Company and let you know
the Local Vendor in India to commence the business. But we will agree
on profit sharing mode before we commence
The Original Indian vendor is selling the raw material at a
considerable low rate Per Litre, while the American company buys at a
profit margin of $,9,000 USD Per Litre. The Company normally demands
between 800-1000 Litres every three months. I will convince the
American company to buy the material from you. We will get the
material from the Indian vendor and supply it to the American company
through their agent over there in India. I still have dealer
information in India, but I don't want to give their information to
the American Company to avoid them knowing the actual price. your duty
will be to get the material from the local dealer and supply to the
American Company, then we (you and I ) will share the profit made on
the basis of 60% for you and 40% for me.
Your role must be played perfectly and the least I will expect from
you is betrayal. Again, I don't i want the American company to know
the real cost or source of the product, likewise, I don't want the
Indian vendor to know about the American company.
Kindly get back to me with your full information, phone number and
contact address, if you are ready to partner with me
. I will guide you
as well as direct on you on how to contact the Local Vendor in India
and how to approach the buyer (USA Company ) for the purchase. I
expect hearing from you as quickly as possible and i will explain more
to you as we progress !
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-16 20:42:06
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello
Thanks for your quick response.Please i would be needing your details;
your names in full,address,mobile number and company name. I feel i
need to explain a bit more to you about this supply.
This product is a known product,although a special product,used by
Pharmaceutical company for production medical treatments and other
vital use. It does not any way violate any Law,both is United States
or India.
I contacted you because the man i was handling this supply
with,died.We were doing it peacefully without any problem whatsoever.
He was serving as a middle person,between the American company,the
local vendor and myself. I do not want the American company to know
the local vendor and purchasing directly. Also do not want the local
vendor to supply directly.
Both of us shares the difference in the prize we buy from the local
vendor and the prize we give the American company. And that is all.
Actually,the Original Indian vendor is selling the Pharma Oil at the
cost of $4,370 USD Per Litre, while the American company bought at the
cost of $13,980 USD Per Liter (Our Profit is about $9,610 USD per
liter). You can now understand why I want to hold on to the business.
I will introduce you to the local vendor,so you can write or call them
to find out their current prize and what quantity they have in stock.
Once this is established,i will direct you to the American company to
apply to supply them. You will give them your own prize,that i will
advise.Once they accept you to supply them,the business is done.
Please,here is my What-app number and i would want you to chart me
up,so we can be in constant communication and i can be updating you
quickly,when needed; +1-253-527-0904 After receiving your details,i
will draft an agreement,on which both of us to transact this and it
will benefit both of us immensely. If you have any question,feel free
to ask me and i shall respond immediately !
Awaiting your reply
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-20 21:29:19
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello
 How are you doing with hope all is well ? i am still waiting to hear from you
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 10:55:18
SUBJECT: Re: Explaining in further details !
Hello
Thank you for your swift response and am sorry for my late reply. We were
engaged in the training camp for days and just got relieved. This is going
to be a long term contract supply,so we need to manage it well.
Like I briefly explained on my first message . There is a raw material
which my company always send me to purchase from India previously , I
left the company to join United States Military when when there was an
opening for recruitment but i still maintained communication with
them, as i am the trusted person they purchase unadulterated of the
raw material. Recently, the director has asked me for the contact of
the local dealer in India to enable them send the new purchasing
manager to India to purchase the product directly from the dealer in
India.
I do not wish to let anyone in the company know about this because of
my interest in the business and the profit i do make each time they
request for it . We would be making enormous gain in supplying the
material to my company and you and i will share the profit. I intend
to present you as a supplier in India (You will be a Middle person
between the company and the local vendor in India). So that my company
will not know the main source of the material. This is just a kind of
buying and selling.
This material can be found in India and South America but best purity
and cheaper in India. The local dealer in India is selling it at the
rate: ($4,370 USD) while my company purchase at the rate of ($13,890 USD)
which has been the market price, and then all profits accrued
would be shared between you and me, after deduction of all your
operational expenditure and logistics.
This would be a long term business relationship between you and our
company. so I want us to take advantage of the market price that the
India dealer offers the product for a good earning. It’s quite
unfortunate what happened to my India partner, Mr. Kunal Krishnan
Reddy, who lived in Dubai UAE. I use to purchase the material from the
local dealer through him in India and supply to my company. But I
found out that he died of Cancer on 12th June 2021, he hailed from
Termilnadu State India. May his soul rest in Peace,
Like I previously stated, I want you to act as the dealer of this raw
materials. You would now purchase the product from the manufacturer
whom late Mr. Kunal Krishnan Reddy used to buy from, and supply to our
company with you as the direct dealer.
After purchasing from local vendor in India , you would sell to our
new purchasing manager at a higher price when he arrives in India. The
profit would be shared between you and I. This business is very
lucrative and it is a continuous business.
Like I said earlier, I don’t want any member of my company to know the
real cost of the product because of my interest, and your role must be
played perfectly and the least I expect from you is betrayal.
Kindly revert back to me if you are interested and capable of handling
it ( trust is the key word).
Awaiting your reply with best wishes, Also supply me with your contact
information while responding like your full names, address and contact
mobile phone number.Thanks
Please, for your information,i joined the USA Military few years ago,which
was one of the major reason,i liaise with my late client to handle the supply
on our both behalf and it have been going on smoothly,until his death.
I was posted by USA Military base on my training to Syria for peace
keeping and here,we are restricted in many ways but we can chart through
Whatsapp so we can be in constant communication and i can be updating
you quickly,when needed.
Awaiting your reply
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 12:19:44
SUBJECT: Re:If you agree on the terms we can commence !
Hello
As i have explained earlier in my previous email. I am currently with
the United States Army and deployed currently to Syria on a
peace-keeping mission. A legal agreement is being drafted by a
lawyer,which i am not disposed to currently,considering where i am.
But i can write out what we will agree on,especially as regard our
profit sharing. Once both of us agree on this terms,it is constitute
an agreement.
(1) You will manage the complete supply contract arrangement,while i
serve as an adviser
(2) Every of the steps of this process shall be transparent between both of us
(3) A third party shall not be included in any way into this and if
for any reason,both of us shall agree first
(4) All payment of the supply coming from the American company,shall
go to your designated account
(5) The sharing model shall be 60% for you(being the handler) and 40%
for me as advisory
(6) The profit that shall be share,would be net profit,after Tax,after
a transparent and computed analysis of the Tax/VAT are deducted.
Go through this and if you are OK by it,we shall commence. State your
complete details when responding,if you agree with the terms above.
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-25 07:10:40
SUBJECT: Re:Do send me your details !
Hello
Good morning to you and my sincere regards to you family ! I got your
email and since we have agreed on terms,please endeavor to send me
your details by email. Names in full,address, company name/position
and Mobile number. Afterwards,i will give you the contact details of
the American company and advise you on how to write them for the
supply contract proposal. We need to be fast in doing this,as i learnt
the American company are short of this product and are in need to
purchase. This is the right time and an opportunity to apply and
possibly secure the supply contract. I await your quick response.
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-25 07:12:13
SUBJECT: Re: No risk whatsoever !
Hello
Please,note there is absolutely no risk attach to this in whatever
way(this i can assure you a 100%).
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-27 04:54:48
SUBJECT: Re: I awaits your details !
Hello
Please,forward me your details like; names in full,address,company
name/position and mobile. Once on receipt,i will commence by
introducing you to the American company. Please,we do not have much
time right now.
The American company from the information i got,are
currently short of this essential ingredient Oil they use for their
production and they are eager to buy. They previously buys from my
late partner but since his death,i know they may be trying to reach
him without success. That is why i want to quickly introduce someone
to them as a dealer from India,because they prefer the Indian product
than the ones from South American base on quality standard. Write me
back.
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-04 15:59:30
SUBJECT: Re:Why the long delay ?
Hello
I am wondering why you have not sent me your details till now.
Please,if you are not interested anymore to partner with me,do let me
know,so i will look for someone else . I found out that the company
are short of product and they need to restock . Now is the opportunity
we have to broker with them.
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-05 05:33:37
SUBJECT: Re: Let me know !
Hello
I have told you repeatedly that,there is no risk whatsoever in this
supply contract. You will stand as intermediary between the buyer and
the seller from India but the buyer will deal with you as the seller.
I will introduce you to both parties and shall be guiding you till
everything is established and commencement .Before we commence,i shall
send you an agreement,that will form the basis of my partnership with
you hence,if you are in agreement,we can then commence.
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
From: m**********y@gmail.com
To: ql49628@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-06 04:01:03
SUBJECT: Re:Tell me !
Hello
What are the risks you imagined that are potential,which may affect
you and i ? Let me know, so i can clarify you on that. We have taken
much time on this discussion,which is not healthy to the success of
this !
Awaiting your response,
Maj.Jack Harry.
